Class MainController

java.lang.Object
fr.connexe.ui.MainController
public class MainController extends Object
The controller of the main layout (menu bar, and overall ui). Is created automatically by the hello-view.xml FXML file.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MainController()
    Creates a new MainController.

  • Method Summary

    Method

    Is called by the main application to give a reference back to itself.
    void
    setMazeController(MazeController mazeController)
    References the MazeController to call its building methods from the menu bar options (new, edit...)

  • Constructor Details

    • MainController

      public MainController()

      Creates a new MainController.

      Automatically called by JavaFX when the controller is created and attached to an FXML node.

  • Method Details

    • handleChange

      public void handleChange()
      Enables the maze editor mode. Content moved in setMazeEditor() for better reusability

    • setMazeEditor

      public void setMazeEditor(boolean editMode)
      Enables the maze editor mode
      Parameters:
      editMode - true to enable the maze editor, false to disable it

    • setConnexeApp

      public void setConnexeApp(ConnexeApp connexeApp)
      Is called by the main application to give a reference back to itself.
      Parameters:
      connexeApp - main application

    • setMazeController

      public void setMazeController(MazeController mazeController)

      References the MazeController to call its building methods from the menu bar options (new, edit...)

      Also configures anything related to that maze controller, must only be called once

      Parameters:
      mazeController - the MazeController to use maze related methods from (building, etc...)
